page.title: 03Post Office in Glenisla.
page.content: There is a post office in Glenisla, which opens every day except Sunday.It closes on Wednesday and Saturday afternoons. A mail bus and a Royal Mail van serve the glen. The mail bus comes every day except Sunday from Alyth, about twelve miles distant, with letters, parcels and milk. Daily newspapers are brought by this bus and delivered with the mail. The post office sells postcards, sweets and papers. It is very small and forms part of the house in which the people who run it live. The mail bus doubles as a bus service and passengers may travel to and fro from Alyth on it. There is only one delivery of mail each day and similarly mail is uplifted only once each day.
